p.d: François has always lived in the love of God, until he met Charlotte. An attraction that led him to renounce the church and return to civilian life. On this tumultuous path to become an ordinary man again and give a new sense to his life, he'll need Marjorie's help. Directed by: Mona Achache (France, 2016) Screenplay: Ivan Calbérac, Cécile Berger, Mona Achache, Fabien Adda Cast: Anne Charrier (Marjorie), Alex Brendemühl (father François), François Vincentelli (Thibault), Mathieu Madénian (Loubet), Marie Guillard (Charlotte), Mathilde Roch (Clémence) Genre: comedy
